parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the data source.

parameters.name: pageNum
parameters.description: The page number. If you leave this parameter empty, all data sources are returned.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. If you leave this parameter empty, all data sources are returned.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of the data source.
